name: 6 7 bag charm
notes:
click here for free pattern tutorial: **[6 7 bag charm tutorial][1]**

we're crafting something funny and super easy to boot! if you're a beginner searching for an easy pattern, a fan of 6 7 and love bag charms, this tutorial is perfect for you. 

do you like the 6 7 meme? me too! so here's a cute 6 7 bag charm to remind everyone of it! join us as we guide you through the entire process of making a 6 7 bag charm from start to finish.

with our easy-to-follow instructions, you'll have your own 6 7 bagcharm in no time! whether you're a seasoned crocheter or just starting out, you'll find this 6 7 bag charm tutorial project both enjoyable and rewarding. 

you will need :
- yarn - in 1 or 2 colors of your choice
- small amounts of colored yarn if you are making the leaf sprout or the bow to embellish your 6 7
- crochet hook
- stitch markers
- hot glue gun or super glue

i use weight 4 yarn for this project and a 3mm hook. if you want your 6 7 bag charm to be the same size as mine, use any yarn that can fit well on a 3mm/no.5 hook

 in this tutorial, you'll learn:

* how to crochet a 6 7 bagcharm
* step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals

✨ why you’ll love this tutorial:

* clear, easy-to-follow instructions
* high-quality, close-up visuals to guide you through each step
* a simple project that takes a short time to finish
* a fun and rewarding project that would make a great gif


  [1]: https://youtu.be/snn5tuvwpdg
